p.d: : Small steps Valérie feels that she has rested enough and it's time for work again. She gets a job interview, but on the same day as Thomas' best friend's birthday. She gives Madeleine the task of taking Thomas to the party. Directed by: Stéphane Lapointe (season 1, Canada, 2016) Screenplay: Isabelle Langlois Cast: Sophie Cadieux (Valérie), Antoine Archambault (Thomas), Sylvie Léonard (Madeleine), Simon Lacroix (Éric), Éric Paulhus (Kevin), Éric Bernier (Stéphane), Jean-MoIse Martin (Simon), Olivia Palacci (Genevieve), Christine Beaulieu (Josiane) Genre: comedy drama
